* Wiaan Mulder, a 26-year-old South African cricketer, has signed to play in Major League Cricket (MLC) throughout July.
* No other details about the MLC tournament, such as schedule, format, or teams, are mentioned in the article.

* South African all-rounder Wiaan Mulder has opted to play in the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament instead of continuing with the T20 Blast campaign.
* Mulder will feature in the MLC throughout July.
* No further information is provided about the MLC tournament, such as its format, teams, or schedule, beyond Mulder's participation.

**Tournament Details**

* The second season of MLC, America's T20 league, will start on July 5th with a championship rematch between MI New York and the Seattle Orcas.
* The three-week tournament will feature an all-star lineup of announcers, including Sunil Gavaskar, Wasim Akram, and Matthew Hayden.

**Broadcast Schedule**

* MLC matches will air on Willow by Cricbuzz in the USA and Canada, with select matches also broadcast on regional sports networks (RSNs) such as YES Network.
* International broadcast partners include Prime Video (Australia and New Zealand), Cricbuzz (Middle East and North Africa), A Sports (Pakistan), ESPN (Sub-Saharan Africa), TNT Sports (UK and Ireland), and more.

**Ticket Information**

* General admission tickets start at $30 per person and are available at tickets.majorleaguecricket.com.
* Fans can expect entertainment, fireworks, free giveaways, player signings, and more at the matches.

**Other Details**

* The MLC features a commitment to supporting the development of cricket talent in the United States, with emerging broadcasters such as Nikhil Uttamchandani and Aaman Patel announcing matches throughout the season.
* The tournament aims to build on the growing popularity of cricket in the US, following the inaugural season and the T20 World Cup.

* MLC has partnered with Lexus as its Automotive Partner for its second edition.
* As part of the agreement, Lexus will have on-field and broadcasting visibility, as well as feature on MLC's official digital platforms.
* The second season of MLC is scheduled to start on July 5, 2024.
* Vijay Srinivasan, CEO of MLC, expressed excitement about the partnership, highlighting the aligning values of luxury and commitment to customers between Lexus and MLC.
* David Telfer, Head of Lexus Advertising & Media, emphasized the opportunity to reach a diverse fanbase and grow with MLC during its second season.

* The San Francisco Unicorns have renewed their official partnership with Menlo Ventures for the second Major League Cricket season, starting this summer. As part of the partnership, Menlo Ventures' branding will be featured on the Unicorns' player helmets during the tournament.
